original: 9.3. Hetuduka, Vipākattikādi🔽Nahetuṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipāke ekaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum na vipākam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava vipāke eka
translated: The Chapter on the Causal Relations in the Triad🔽With respect to a non-cause that is not an effect … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)

original: Nahetuṁ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ naupādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na aupādinnupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With respect to a non-cause that is a phenomenon which is neither an effect nor a cause … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)🔽With respect to a non-cause that is not an object of clinging … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)

original: Nahetuṁ naanupādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na anupādinnupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na anupādinna anupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With respect to a non-cause that is not an object of clinging … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)🔽With respect to a non-cause that is not an object of clinging … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)🔽With respect to a non-cause that is not defiled and not subject to defilements … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)

analyzed: na hetum na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With respect to a non-cause that is not defiled and not subject to defilements … (all nine sections are to be elaborated in the same way as above.)

original: Nahetuṁ naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ nasavitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ naavitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ naavitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na sa vitakka sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na a vitakka vicāra mattam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na a vitakka avicāram dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: With an object that is not a root cause and that is neither a defiling object nor related to the defilements … (all nine chapters should be treated here.)🔽With an object that is not a root cause and that is not connected with thinking and exploring … (all nine chapters should be treated here.)🔽With an object that is not a root cause and that is not connected with thinking but only with exploring … (all nine chapters should be treated here.)🔽With an object that is not a root cause and that is not connected with thinking or exploring … (all nine chapters should be treated here.)🔽

original: Nahetuṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava 🔽na hetum na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava 🔽na hetum na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava 🔽na hetum na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava 🔽na hetum na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava

original: Nahetuṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)🔽Nahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)🔽Nahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava vipākam natthi  na hetum na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava  na hetum na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
translated: “With a non-cause that is neither to be given up by seeing nor by cultivation as condition … (all nine resultant triplets and all nine action triplets, omitting the vipāka, are to be elaborated here.)🔽“With a non-cause that is not to be given up by seeing as condition there arises what is not to be given up by seeing … (all nine triplets, omitting the vipāka, are to be elaborated here.)🔽“With a non-cause that is not to be given up by cultivation as condition there arises what is not to be given up by cultivation … (all nine triplets, omitting the vipāka, are to be elaborated here.)

original: Nahetuṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: na hetum na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava vipākam natthi
translated: “With a non-cause that is neither to be given up by seeing nor by cultivation as condition there arises what is neither to be given up by seeing nor by cultivation … (all nine triplets, omitting the vipāka, are to be elaborated here.)
